org.settings4j.util
Class ELConnectorWrapper

java.lang.Object
  org.settings4j.util.ELConnectorWrapper

public class ELConnectorWrapper
extends java.lang.Object

This Wrapper makes the Getter-Methodes of Connectors simply accessible by Expressionlanguages like JSP 2.0, Velocity or Freemarker.

Example:
${connectors.string['xyz']} returns the first founded Value in all Connectors: connector.getString("xyz");

Author:
Harald.Brabenetz

          Only one Connector Constructor.
ELConnectorWrapper(Connector[] connectors)
          The list of all connectors, where Values can be searched.
